verses.text: \w And|strong="G2532"\w* I \w stood|strong="G2476"\w* \w upon|strong="G1909"\w* the \w sand|strong="G0285"\w* of the \w sea|strong="G2281"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w saw|strong="G1492"\w* a \w beast|strong="G2342"\w* rise \w up|strong="G0305"\w* out \w of|strong="G1537"\w* the \w sea|strong="G2281"\w*, \w having|strong="G2192"\w* \w seven|strong="G2033"\w* \w heads|strong="G2776"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w ten|strong="G1176"\w* \w horns|strong="G2768"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w upon|strong="G1909"\w* \w his|strong="G0846"\w* \w horns|strong="G2768"\w* \w ten|strong="G1176"\w* \w crowns|strong="G1238"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w upon|strong="G1909"\w* \w his|strong="G0846"\w* \w heads|strong="G2776"\w* the \w name|strong="G3686"\w* of \w blasphemy|strong="G0988"\w*.

\w And|strong="G2532"\w* the \w beast|strong="G2342"\w* \w which|strong="G3739"\w* I \w saw|strong="G1492"\w* \w was|strong="G2258"\w* like \w unto|strong="G3664"\w* a \w leopard|strong="G3917"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w his|strong="G0846"\w* \w feet|strong="G4228"\w* were \w as|strong="G5613"\w* \add the feet\add* of a \w bear|strong="G0715"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w his|strong="G0846"\w* \w mouth|strong="G4750"\w* \w as|strong="G5613"\w* the \w mouth|strong="G4750"\w* of a \w lion|strong="G3023"\w*: \w and|strong="G2532"\w* the \w dragon|strong="G1404"\w* \w gave|strong="G1325"\w* \w him|strong="G0846"\w* \w his|strong="G0846"\w* \w power|strong="G1411"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w his|strong="G0846"\w* \w seat|strong="G2362"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w great|strong="G3173"\w* \w authority|strong="G1849"\w*.

\w And|strong="G2532"\w* I \w saw|strong="G1492"\w* \w one|strong="G1520"\w* of \w his|strong="G0846"\w* \w heads|strong="G2776"\w* as it \w were|strong="G5613"\w* \w wounded|strong="G4969"\w* \w to|strong="G1519"\w* \w death|strong="G2288"\w*; \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w his|strong="G0846"\w* \w deadly|strong="G2288"\w* \w wound|strong="G4127"\w* was \w healed|strong="G2323"\w*: \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w all|strong="G3650"\w* the \w world|strong="G1093"\w* \w wondered|strong="G2296"\w* \w after|strong="G3694"\w* the \w beast|strong="G2342"\w*.

\w And|strong="G2532"\w* they \w worshipped|strong="G4352"\w* the \w dragon|strong="G1404"\w* \w which|strong="G3739"\w* \w gave|strong="G1325"\w* \w power|strong="G1849"\w* unto the \w beast|strong="G2342"\w*: \w and|strong="G2532"\w* they \w worshipped|strong="G4352"\w* the \w beast|strong="G2342"\w*, \w saying|strong="G3004"\w*, \w Who|strong="G5101"\w* \add is\add* like \w unto|strong="G3664"\w* the \w beast|strong="G2342"\w*? \w who|strong="G5101"\w* is \w able|strong="G1410"\w* to make \w war|strong="G4170"\w* \w with|strong="G3326"\w* \w him|strong="G0846"\w*?

\w And|strong="G2532"\w* there was \w given|strong="G1325"\w* unto \w him|strong="G0846"\w* a \w mouth|strong="G4750"\w* \w speaking|strong="G2980"\w* great \w things|strong="G3173"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w blasphemies|strong="G0988"\w*; \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w power|strong="G1849"\w* was \w given|strong="G1325"\w* unto \w him|strong="G0846"\w* to \w continue|strong="G4160"\w* \w forty|strong="G5062"\w* \add and\add* \w two|strong="G1417"\w* \w months|strong="G3376"\w*.

\w And|strong="G2532"\w* he \w opened|strong="G0455"\w* \w his|strong="G0846"\w* \w mouth|strong="G4750"\w* \w in|strong="G1519"\w* \w blasphemy|strong="G0988"\w* \w against|strong="G4314"\w* \w God|strong="G2316"\w*, to \w blaspheme|strong="G0987"\w* \w his|strong="G0846"\w* \w name|strong="G3686"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w his|strong="G0846"\w* \w tabernacle|strong="G4633"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w them|strong="G3588"\w* that \w dwell|strong="G4637"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* \w heaven|strong="G3772"\w*.

\w And|strong="G2532"\w* it was \w given|strong="G1325"\w* unto \w him|strong="G0846"\w* to \w make|strong="G4160"\w* \w war|strong="G4171"\w* \w with|strong="G3326"\w* the \w saints|strong="G0040"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* to \w overcome|strong="G3528"\w* \w them|strong="G0846"\w*: \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w power|strong="G1849"\w* was \w given|strong="G1325"\w* \w him|strong="G0846"\w* \w over|strong="G1909"\w* \w all|strong="G3956"\w* \w kindreds|strong="G5443"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w tongues|strong="G1100"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w nations|strong="G1484"\w*.

\w And|strong="G2532"\w* \w all|strong="G3956"\w* \w that|strong="G3588"\w* \w dwell|strong="G2730"\w* \w upon|strong="G1909"\w* the \w earth|strong="G1093"\w* shall \w worship|strong="G4352"\w* \w him|strong="G0846"\w*, \w whose|strong="G3739"\w* \w names|strong="G3686"\w* \w are|strong="G1125"\w* \w not|strong="G3756"\w* \w written|strong="G1125"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* the \w book|strong="G0976"\w* of \w life|strong="G2222"\w* of the \w Lamb|strong="G0721"\w* \w slain|strong="G4969"\w* \w from|strong="G0575"\w* the \w foundation|strong="G2602"\w* of the \w world|strong="G2889"\w*.
\w If|strong="G1487"\w* any \w man|strong="G5100"\w* \w have|strong="G2192"\w* an \w ear|strong="G3775"\w*, let him \w hear|strong="G0191"\w*.

\w He|strong="G5100"\w* \w that|strong="G1487"\w* leadeth \w into|strong="G4863"\w* \w captivity|strong="G0161"\w* shall \w go|strong="G5217"\w* \w into|strong="G1519"\w* \w captivity|strong="G0161"\w*: \w he|strong="G5100"\w* \w that|strong="G1487"\w* \w killeth|strong="G0615"\w* \w with|strong="G1722"\w* the \w sword|strong="G3162"\w* \w must|strong="G1163"\w* \w be|strong="G0846"\w* \w killed|strong="G0615"\w* \w with|strong="G1722"\w* the \w sword|strong="G3162"\w*. \w Here|strong="G5602"\w* \w is|strong="G2076"\w* the \w patience|strong="G5281"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* the \w faith|strong="G4102"\w* of the \w saints|strong="G0040"\w*.

\w And|strong="G2532"\w* I \w beheld|strong="G1492"\w* \w another|strong="G0243"\w* \w beast|strong="G2342"\w* coming \w up|strong="G0305"\w* out \w of|strong="G1537"\w* the \w earth|strong="G1093"\w*; \w and|strong="G2532"\w* he \w had|strong="G2192"\w* \w two|strong="G1417"\w* \w horns|strong="G2768"\w* \w like|strong="G3664"\w* a \w lamb|strong="G0721"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* he \w spake|strong="G2980"\w* \w as|strong="G5613"\w* a \w dragon|strong="G1404"\w*.

\w And|strong="G2532"\w* he \w exerciseth|strong="G4160"\w* \w all|strong="G3956"\w* the \w power|strong="G1849"\w* of the \w first|strong="G4413"\w* \w beast|strong="G2342"\w* \w before|strong="G1799"\w* \w him|strong="G0846"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w causeth|strong="G4160"\w* the \w earth|strong="G1093"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w them|strong="G3588"\w* which \w dwell|strong="G2730"\w* \w therein|strong="G0846"\w* \w to|strong="G2443"\w* \w worship|strong="G4352"\w* the \w first|strong="G4413"\w* \w beast|strong="G2342"\w*, \w whose|strong="G3739"\w* \w deadly|strong="G2288"\w* \w wound|strong="G4127"\w* was \w healed|strong="G2323"\w*.

\w And|strong="G2532"\w* he \w doeth|strong="G4160"\w* \w great|strong="G3173"\w* \w wonders|strong="G4592"\w*, \w so|strong="G2443"\w* \w that|strong="G2532"\w* he \w maketh|strong="G4160"\w* \w fire|strong="G4442"\w* come \w down|strong="G2597"\w* \w from|strong="G1537"\w* \w heaven|strong="G3772"\w* \w on|strong="G1519"\w* the \w earth|strong="G1093"\w* in the \w sight|strong="G1799"\w* of \w men|strong="G0444"\w*,

\w And|strong="G2532"\w* \w deceiveth|strong="G4105"\w* \w them|strong="G3588"\w* that \w dwell|strong="G2730"\w* \w on|strong="G1909"\w* the \w earth|strong="G1093"\w* \w by|strong="G1223"\w* \add the means of\add* \w those|strong="G3588"\w* \w miracles|strong="G4592"\w* \w which|strong="G3739"\w* \w he|strong="G0846"\w* had \w power|strong="G1325"\w* to \w do|strong="G4160"\w* in the sight \w of|strong="G1799"\w* the \w beast|strong="G2342"\w*; \w saying|strong="G3004"\w* to \w them|strong="G3588"\w* that \w dwell|strong="G2730"\w* \w on|strong="G1909"\w* the \w earth|strong="G1093"\w*, that they should \w make|strong="G4160"\w* an \w image|strong="G1504"\w* to the \w beast|strong="G2342"\w*, \w which|strong="G3739"\w* \w had|strong="G2192"\w* the \w wound|strong="G4127"\w* by a \w sword|strong="G3162"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* did \w live|strong="G2198"\w*.

\w And|strong="G2532"\w* \w he|strong="G0846"\w* had \w power|strong="G1325"\w* to \w give|strong="G1325"\w* \w life|strong="G4151"\w* unto the \w image|strong="G1504"\w* of the \w beast|strong="G2342"\w*, \w that|strong="G2443"\w* the \w image|strong="G1504"\w* of the \w beast|strong="G2342"\w* \w should|strong="G2980"\w* \w both|strong="G2532"\w* \w speak|strong="G2980"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w cause|strong="G4160"\w* \w that|strong="G2443"\w* as \w many|strong="G3745"\w* \w as|strong="G0302"\w* \w would|strong="G4352"\w* \w not|strong="G3361"\w* \w worship|strong="G4352"\w* the \w image|strong="G1504"\w* of the \w beast|strong="G2342"\w* should be \w killed|strong="G0615"\w*.

\w And|strong="G2532"\w* he \w causeth|strong="G4160"\w* \w all|strong="G3956"\w*, \w both|strong="G2532"\w* \w small|strong="G3398"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w great|strong="G3173"\w*, \w rich|strong="G4145"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w poor|strong="G4434"\w*, \w free|strong="G1658"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w bond|strong="G1401"\w*, \w to|strong="G2443"\w* \w receive|strong="G1325"\w* a \w mark|strong="G5480"\w* \w in|strong="G1909"\w* \w their|strong="G0846"\w* \w right|strong="G1188"\w* \w hand|strong="G5495"\w*, \w or|strong="G2228"\w* \w in|strong="G1909"\w* \w their|strong="G0846"\w* \w foreheads|strong="G3359"\w*:

\w And|strong="G2532"\w* \w that|strong="G2443"\w* \w no|strong="G3361"\w* \w man|strong="G5100"\w* \w might|strong="G1410"\w* \w buy|strong="G0059"\w* \w or|strong="G2228"\w* \w sell|strong="G4453"\w*, save \w he|strong="G3361"\w* \w that|strong="G1487"\w* \w had|strong="G2192"\w* the \w mark|strong="G5480"\w*, \w or|strong="G2228"\w* the \w name|strong="G3686"\w* of the \w beast|strong="G2342"\w*, \w or|strong="G2228"\w* the \w number|strong="G0706"\w* of \w his|strong="G0846"\w* \w name|strong="G3686"\w*.

\w Here|strong="G5602"\w* \w is|strong="G2076"\w* \w wisdom|strong="G4678"\w*. Let \w him|strong="G3588"\w* that \w hath|strong="G2192"\w* \w understanding|strong="G3563"\w* \w count|strong="G5585"\w* the \w number|strong="G0706"\w* of the \w beast|strong="G2342"\w*: \w for|strong="G1063"\w* it \w is|strong="G2076"\w* the \w number|strong="G0706"\w* of a \w man|strong="G0444"\w*; \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w his|strong="G0846"\w* \w number|strong="G0706"\w* \add is\add* Six hundred \w threescore|strong="G5516"\w* \add and\add* \w six|strong="G5516"\w*.
